text: [A] [(1) Put the top card of your Library into Clock, put this in Memory] When this becomes Reversed in battle, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 ::Memory Snow:: Character, show it to your Opponent, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.

[A] At the beginning of your Attack Phase, choose 1 of your YELLOW Characters, and that Character gains +500 Power for the turn.
[S] BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest this] Flip over the top 4 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, search your Library for up to 1 ::Memory Snow:: Character, show it to your Opponent, put it in your hand, and Shuffle your Library.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may choose 1 card in your Level, and either 1 "Petra, Aim for New York?" or "Petra, Delicious Treats" in your Waiting Room, and Swap them.
[A] RECOLLECTION [Put a card from hand to Stock] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, if "Snow Rabbit" is in your Memory, you may pay cost. is so, this gains +2500 Power for the turn.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.
[A] [Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose 1 "YUKI-USAGI, Flying Assault-Type Heavy Firepower Battle Weapon" in your Waiting Room and return it to hand.
[A] RECOLLECTION When this attacks, if you have 4 or more "Snow Rabbit" in Memory, choose 1 Character, and for the turn that Character gains +3000 Power and +1 Soul.
[A] When this attacks, choose 1 of your other ::Memory Snow:: Characters, and that Character gains +X Power for the turn. X equals the number of your other ::Memory Snow:: Characters times 500.

[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is higher than the Level of your Opponent, you may put that Character in Stock. If so, put the bottom card of your Opponent's Stock in the Waiting Room.

[C] EXPERIENCE If "Petra, Aim for New York?" and "Petra, Delicious Treats" are in your Level, this gets -1 Level in hand.
[A] CX COMBO If "Out-of-Season Snow Festival" is in your Climax Zone and this is in your Front Row, until the next end of your Opponent's turn this gains the following ability. "At the beginning of the Attack Phase, choose up to 2 Level 0 or lower ::Memory Snow:: Characters in your Waiting Room, place them to separate Slots on the Stage, and you may put the top card of your Library into the Waiting Room. If that card is a ::Memory Snow:: Character or "YUKI-USAGI, Flying Assault-Type Heavy Firepower Battle Weapon", choose 1 of your other Level 0 or lower Characters, and for the turn that Character gains +9000 Power and +1 Soul."

[C] If you are Level 3 or higher, Character Opposite this gets -1 Soul.
[A] At the beginning of your Opponent's Attack Phase, you may put the top card of your Library in the Waiting Room. If that card is a ::Memory Snow:: Character or "YUKI-USAGI, Flying Assault-Type Heavy Firepower Battle Weapon", you may move this to an empty Slot in your Front Row.

[C] If you do not have another ::Memory Snow:: Character, this does not Stand during your Stand Phase.
[C] This cannot Side Attack.

[C] If you have 2 or more other ::Memory Snow:: Characters, this gains +1 Level and +3500 Power.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, if you have 2 or less chards in your Memory, you may choose 1 "Snow Rabbit" in your Waiting Room and send it to Memory.
[A] CX COMBO When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, if "The First Tiki Tiki Snow Festival" is in you Climax Zone, search your Library for up to 1 YELLOW Character, show it to your Opponent, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.

RECOLLECTION If you do not have a ::Memory Snow:: Character, you may not play this from hand.
If you have 3 or more "Snow Rabbit" in your Memory, deal 2 Damage to your Opponent, and put up to 1 card from the top of your Clock to the Waiting Room. (Damage Cancel can occur)
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, reveal up to 3 cards from the top your Library. If 1 or more cards are revealed in this manner, choose up to 1 ::Memory Snow:: Character from among them, put it in your hand, put the remainder of those cards in the Waiting Room, choose 1 card in your hand and discard it to the Waiting Room.

[C] RECOLLECTION If "Rem, Leave Everything to Me" is in your Memory, this gains +2000 Power.
[A] CX COMBO When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, if "Daily Work" is in your Climax Zone, choose up to 1 of your ::Memory Snow:: Characters, return it to your hand, choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains +1000 Power for the turn.

[C] All of your other ::Memory Snow:: Characters set +1500 Power.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.
[S] [Rest this] Look at the top 2 cards of your Library and put them on top of your Library in any order

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, if you have 2 or more other ::Memory Snow:: Characters, you may take the top card of your Clock and put it in the Waiting Room.
[A] RECOLLECTION When this card attacks, if you have 2 or more "Rem, Leave Everything to Me" in Memory, choose 1 of your Characters, and for the turn that Character gains +1000 Power and +1 Soul.

[A] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, if you have 2 or more other ::Memory Snow:: Characters, you may send this to Memory. At the beginning of your next Draw Phase, choose 1 "Beatrice, Working Hard on Their Own" in your Memory, place it to any Slot on your Stage, choose 1 of your other Characters, and until the next end of your Opponent's turn, that Character gains +1000 Power.

[A] At the start of your Opponent's Attack Phase, you may put the top card of your Library in the Waiting Room. If it's a ::Memory Snow:: Character, you may move this to an empty Slot in the Front Row.
[C] If there are 2 or fewer cards in your Stock, this gains +1500 Power.

[C] ASSIST All your Level 3 or higher Characters in front of this gain +2000 Power.

[C] For each of your other ::Memory Snow:: Characters, this gains +500 Power.

[C] For each of your other ::Memory Snow:: Characters, this gains +500 Power.
[A] CX COMBO [(1)] When this attacks, if "Participating in the Snow Festival!" is in your Climax Zone, you may pay cost. If so, choose a Character in your Waiting Room whose Level is 1 + your Level or less and place it Rested to any Slot on your Stage, and for the turn this Character gains +2000 Power.

[C] If you have another "Wonderful Subawaal Statue", this gains +2000 Power.
[A] [(1)] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose a "Rem, Ideal Fusion" in your Waiting Room and place it to any Slot on your Stage.
[A] CX COMBO [(1)] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, if "Look of Expectation" is in your Climax Zone and you have 4 or more other ::Memory Snow:: Characters, you may pay cost. If so, deal 3 Damage to your Opponent. (Damage Cancel can occur)

[C] This card cannot attack.
[C] If all of your Characters are ::Memory Snow::, this card gains +1000 Power and cannot be chosen as the target of your Opponent's effects.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage or via MERGE to the Stage, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.
[A] At the beginning of your Encore Step, if this is Standing in your Front Row, reveal the top card of your Library, place it in Stock, and deal X Damage to your Opponent. X equals the number of Soul Trigger Icons on that card + 2. (Damage Cancel can occur)

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, this gains +1500 Power for the turn.
[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is 0 or lower, you may Reverse that Character.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, reveal the top card of your Library. If it's Level 2 or higher, put it in your Stock. (Climax cards are considered Level 0 for this effect. Otherwise put it back where it was)
[A] [(2)] When this is placed from the Stage to the Waiting Room, you may pay cost. If so, choose a ::Memory Snow:: Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[C] During your turn, this gains +1000 Power.

[C] All your other ::Memory Snow:: Characters gain +500 Power.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, Choose 1 of your Characters, and for the turn that Character gains Level +1.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, put the top 2 cards of your Library in the Waiting Room. If there were at least 1 Climax card among them, this gains +3000 Power for the turn.

[C] All your other ::Memory Snow:: Characters gain +500 Power.

[S] MERGE [Put a "Subaru, My Presents!" from your Stage face-up under this as Marker] Search your Library for up to 1 "Wonderful Subawaal Statue", put it in the Slot this is in, put all Markers from under this as well as this card face-up under that "Wonderful Subawaal Statue" as Markers in any order, and shuffle your Library.

[S] [(1) Put a "Puck, Great Spirit Attack" from Stage to the Waiting Room, put this in the Waiting Room] All players put all their Front Row Center Characters in the Waiting Room. Until the next end of your Opponent's turn, Players may not place cards to Front Row Center Slot, and cannot choose that Slot. (The Slot cannot be chosen for playing, moving to, or effects)
Choose 1 of your Opponent's Characters, and that Character gets -2000 Power for the turn.
